amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 as en bloc No. 3: Nos. 54, 56, 59, 63, 66, 72, 78, 79, 80, 81, 82, 83, 84, 86, 95, 96, and 97.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendments Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendments Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
